reuters.title: SITHE-ENERGIES L.P. TO INVEST 100 MLN DLRS IN ENERGY FACTORS, COMPANY SAYS
reuters.body:
Alcan Aluminum Corp, a subsidiary of Alcan Aluminium Ltd, said it increased its U.S. primary aluminum prices by two cents a lb, effective yesterday. The new prices are 72 cents a lb for ingot and 80 cents for extrusion billet, the company said.
Reuter 
